nodes.text: Another masterclass in point elusion. To be fair, there is some doubt as to whether it was ever identifed, so that may remain forever moot. The missing ingredient in Archie's scenario, (other than logic) is of course that his black and white mindset leads him into describing the gun as a 'mere' tool, resulting in his avoidance of the fact that it is also a facilitator, an efficient effective multiplier of an individual's killing capacity, which is entirely dependent on the gun, as originally succinctly defined by Ozzy.

So you know what Ozzy was trying to say in his pointless statement? How do you know your interpretation is correct while mine is wrong? How exactly do you justify taking the word of a man who bit the head off of a bat, as something credible?
